video.title: Clifford the Big Red Dog
video.synopsis: This enduring animated series for kids stars supersized pooch Clifford and his owner, Emily Elizabeth, who impart valuable lessons to young viewers.

episodes.synopsis: Emily learns that sometimes the best things in life are right under your nose. / Cleo doesn't want to share her new toy with anyone.
episodes.title: My Best Friend / Cleo's Fair Share

episodes.synopsis: Clifford accidentally breaks a present he was supposed to deliver for Emily. / Clifford tries to stay clean for a magazine's Dog of the Year contest.
episodes.title: Special Delivery / A Ferry Tale

episodes.synopsis: Emily has to take care of a baby bird, leaving her little time to play with Clifford. / Emily is jealous when Jetta gets to visit an exciting city.
episodes.title: And Birdy Makes Three / Home Is Where the Fun Is

episodes.synopsis: Everyone, including Clifford, must work as a team to put on the fall carnival. / Emily's cousin Laura and her dog, Rex, arrive for a visit.
episodes.title: Clifford's Carnival / Clifford's Doggy Reunion

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone finds himself in a race against Mac. / When the dogs eat too many treats, they learn that too much of a good thing can be bad.
episodes.title: The Great Race / Tummy Trouble

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback story, Cleo shakes things up when she arrives on the island. / When Cleo makes a new friend, she starts ignoring Clifford and T-Bone.
episodes.title: Cleo Comes to Town / False Friends

episodes.synopsis: Emily competes against Jetta for the lead in the school play. / Clifford itches like crazy but hides his discomfort to avoid a trip to the doctor.
episodes.title: Clifford and the Beanstalk / Itchy Patch

episodes.synopsis: The new dog in town has only three legs, which makes the gang uncomfortable. / Clifford's digging talents become an asset when a big storm blows in.
episodes.title: A New Friend / Stormy Weather

episodes.synopsis: Clifford learns that stars, like everyone else, sometimes need help. / Cleo develops stage fright when the dogs are recruited to help with a show.
episodes.title: Circus Stars / Limelight Fright

episodes.synopsis: All fingers and paws point to Emily as the thief when Jetta's trophy and locket vanish. / Jetta mocks Emily's plans for her birthday party activities.
episodes.title: To Catch a Bird / The Best Party Ever

episodes.synopsis: When Mac tears one of Jetta's sweaters, he feels terrible about it and runs away. / Jetta learns that it's OK to have fears and admit them.
episodes.title: Come Back, Mac / Boo!

episodes.synopsis: In flashbacks, Emily meets Clifford, and her love turns him into the biggest dog around. / Clifford has to dispel preconceived ideas about large dogs.
episodes.title: Little Clifford / Welcome to Birdwell Island

episodes.synopsis: When T-Bone inadvertently "steals" a toy, his conscience bothers him. / Cleo plays a series of tricks on Clifford and T-Bone.
episodes.title: Doing the Right Thing / The Dog Who Cried Woof!

episodes.synopsis: Clifford learns the importance of keeping a promise. / Charley wants to throw in the towel when he can't master the sport of "jiggly juggle."
episodes.title: Leaf of Absence / Nobody's Perfect

episodes.synopsis: When the dogs go to school for the first time, T-Bone fears he won't be able to keep up with his classmates. / The library sponsors an essay contest.
episodes.title: Teacher's Pet / Islander of the Year

episodes.synopsis: No one has time to play with Clifford because they're busy planning a surprise party for him! / T-Bone's pals help him tackle his fear of loud noises.
episodes.title: Clifford's Big Surprise / The Ears Have It

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone decides to "toughen up." / Worried that his new telescope may get damaged at the Emily's space-themed party, Charley decides to stay home.
episodes.title: Tough Enough / Stars in Your Eyes

episodes.synopsis: When Mac starts a club and tries to exclude T-Bone, Cleo and Clifford refuse to join. / Mr. Bleakman makes the park off limits to dogs.
episodes.title: Mac's Secret Dog Club / The Dog Park

episodes.synopsis: Cleo learns a lesson about bragging when she gets a dose of her own medicine. / Vaz stops playing soccer when Jetta tells him he's hampering the team.
episodes.title: Fluffed Up Cleo / Team Spirit

episodes.synopsis: Emily and Charley can't agree on what kind of float to make for the Birdwell Parade. / Cleo learns that playing is more fun when everyone takes turns.
episodes.title: Clifford on Parade / Follow the Leader

episodes.synopsis: After misconstruing a conversation, Clifford and Cleo think T-Bone's moving. / The dogs try to get rid of two cats who move in to next door to T-Bone.
episodes.title: Good-Bye T-Bone / The Truth About Cats and Dogs

episodes.synopsis: The whole town bands together to get Clifford through the night while Emily is away. / Charley decides he wants to lead a dog's life.
episodes.title: The Big Sleepover / Dog for a Day

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone develops a crush on a cute little poodle named Mimi. / Clifford works hard to try to make the perfect valentine for Emily.
episodes.title: T-Bone, Dog About Town / Clifford's Big Heart

episodes.synopsis: A jealous Cleo thinks Mrs. Diller likes her sister's cute puppy more than she likes Cleo. / Clifford, Cleo and T-Bone learn to take care of a pet.
episodes.title: Who Me, Jealous? / A Bunny in a Haystack

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone is too embarrassed to wear his new sweater after Mac teases him about it. / A family friend's visit teaches Emily that love comes in all sizes.
episodes.title: Clothes Don't Make the Dog / Short-Changed

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone eats all of Cleo's new dog food and then blames it on another dog. / Charley and Emily have an ice-cream social while Charley's father is out.
episodes.title: The Kibble Crook / Screaming for Ice Cream

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback story, Clifford's size scares T-Bone when they first meet. / When Emily comes down with a bad cold, the gang tries to cheer her up.
episodes.title: New Dog in Town / Get Well

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Bleakman learns about having fun when he babysits Clifford for the day. / T-Bone goes on a quest to find out how others spend their Saturdays.
episodes.title: Babysitter Blues / Saturday Morning

episodes.synopsis: Clifford's paw is too big for a paw print in the cement at the new recreation center. / Clifford gets blamed when a mischievous dog causes trouble.
episodes.title: Best Paw Forward / Then Came Bob

episodes.synopsis: Cleo is Clifford's houseguest while her house is being painted. / The dogs try to turn Mr. Bleakman's frown into a smile by secretly doing good deeds.
episodes.title: Friends, Morning, Noon and Night / Mr. Bleakman's Special Day

episodes.synopsis: In a flashback story, the Howards face challenges when they arrive on Birdwell Island. / Jetta breaks a play date with Emily for a "better offer."
episodes.title: Welcome to the Doghouse / Promises, Promises

episodes.synopsis: When Clifford gets a bad case of the hiccups, his dog friends try to find a remedy. / At Jetta's movie party, she shows only home movies of herself.
episodes.title: Clifford's Hiccups / It's My Party

episodes.synopsis: Clifford tries to clean out his doghouse but can't seem to part with any items. / Jetta must share the spotlight with her new baby brother.
episodes.title: Clifford Cleans His Room / And Baby Makes Four

episodes.synopsis: Jealous Jetta invents a pet when the other kids fuss over Clifford. / Cleo discovers that she can earn treats by helping Vaz with his paper route.
episodes.title: Jetta's Tall Tale / The Big Fetch

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and Emily try to persuade "party pooper" Mr. Bleakman to attend the Howard family's potluck. / Emily writes a poem for her mother's birthday.
episodes.title: Potluck Party Pooper / The Best Gift

episodes.synopsis: When K.C. returns for a visit, Cleo focuses her attention on him, ignoring T-Bone and Clifford. / Rain threatens to ruin the back-to-school barbecue.
episodes.title: Two's Company / Fair-Weather Friends

episodes.synopsis: The kids plant a flower garden for Keep Birdwell Island Beautiful month. / Jetta is wrongly credited when the dogs find Capt. Birdwell's lost trunk.
episodes.title: Doggie Garden / Captain Birdwell's Treasure

episodes.synopsis: Jetta and Emily trade dogs for the annual Topsy Turvy Day. / Cleo and Mac insist that Clifford polish his manners for Mrs. Bleakman's book-club party.
episodes.title: Topsy Turvy Day / Clifford's Charm School

episodes.synopsis: When Clifford forgets a play date, Cleo refuses to accept his apology. / Cleo teases T-Bone about how much he likes visiting poodle Mimi.
episodes.title: Forgive and Forget / Mimi's Back in Town

episodes.synopsis: Clifford lends his favorite blanket to his friends, who thoughtlessly get it dirty. / The gang helps a friend dig up dinosaur bones for a project.
episodes.title: Blanket Blues / Dino Clifford

episodes.synopsis: Cleo pretends to hurt her paw so she won't have to embarrass herself on the ice rink. / Jetta insists on taking on a big job so she can be the "hero."
episodes.title: That's Snow Lie / A Friend in Need

episodes.synopsis: Emily Elizabeth writes a letter to her favorite pop star and discovers that wishes do come true. / Cleo makes everyone think she's a beachball hero.
episodes.title: Fan Mail / Hooray for Cleo

episodes.synopsis: Having been scared by a ghost movie, T-Bone resolves to not let fear get to him. / Jetta decides she really wants to win a model-building contest.
episodes.title: Nothing to Fur But Fur Itself / Jetta's Project

episodes.synopsis: Clifford can't resist going into a field to play, even after he's told not to. / Mr. Bleakman gets grumpy when Clifford messes up his potato garden.
episodes.title: Stinky Friends / He's Wonderful Mr. Bleakman

episodes.synopsis: Distracted by a magic craze, Charley neglects an important assignment. / When Emily Elizabeth scratches Clifford's "sweet spot," his back leg thumps.
episodes.title: Magic in the Air / Everyone Loves Clifford

episodes.synopsis: Clifford grows too big for the Howards' city apartment. / Jetta inadvertently gives Emily Elizabeth a sweater that was a gift from her grandma.
episodes.title: Clifford Grows Up / Jetta's Sweater

episodes.synopsis: T-Bone generously offers to watch Cleo's niece KiKi so Cleo can get some rest. / Cleo goes overboard preparing a special gift for Clifford and T-Bone.
episodes.title: Big Hearted T-Bone / Cleo's Valentine Surprise

episodes.synopsis: When Vaz rips his pants, everyone helps him feel better by telling embarrassing stories. / Emily Elizabeth loses her lucky stone and her confidence.
episodes.title: Embarassing Moments / Lucky Charm

episodes.synopsis: A small dog moves to Birdwell Island and is envious of Clifford's size. / When Clifford moves to the Island he makes friends with T-Bone.
episodes.title: Little Big Pup / Getting to Know You

episodes.synopsis: Charley promises to teach Emily Elizabeth how to fish, then keeps putting it off. / To avoid baths, Cleo runs away from home.
episodes.title: Fishing Lessons / No Baths for Cleo

episodes.synopsis: Emily Elizabeth keeps putting off cleaning her room. / When T-Bone thinks he is responsible for getting Mac in trouble, he goes overboard to help Mac.
episodes.title: Another Fine Mess / King Mac

episodes.synopsis: Jetta gives Charley a hard time about wanting to be a Martial Arts Master. / When K.C. tells the gang he's too busy to play, Cleo feels slighted.
episodes.title: When I Grow Up / Not Now, I'm Busy

episodes.synopsis: Emily Elizabeth's new project gets all the dogs thinking about what makes them special. / Jetta can't resist reading Emily Elizabeth's journal.
episodes.title: Special T-Bone / Jetta's Sneak Peak

episodes.synopsis: Vaz gets a satellite dish and begins to lose himself to the world of TV. / Mac worries that Jetta loves her mechanical toy dog more than he loves her.
episodes.title: Vaz Goes Down the Tubes / Cyber Puppy Problems

episodes.synopsis: The dogs see another dog wearing a cone collar and Cleo and Mac make assumptions. / Jetta volunteers to watch her brother but finds him too energetic.
episodes.title: Cleo Gets a Cone / A Job Well Read

episodes.synopsis: When Cleo accuses T-Bone of trying to steal her bone, Clifford gets caught in the middle of a feud. / The kids throw a "Treasure Island" theme party.
episodes.title: Who Moved My Bone / Clifford Pirate King

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Bleakman bakes a giant cookie for the Birdwell Fair, then leaves it unattended. / When Jetta's pen pal visits the island, nothing goes as planned.
episodes.title: Clifford's Cookie Craving / Jetta's Friend

episodes.synopsis: Clifford and his friends are influenced by advertisements for a new dog food. / T-Bone learns his old best buddy, Burger, is coming for a visit.
episodes.title: Food for Thought / Friends Forever

episodes.synopsis: It's raining and Cleo's going stir-crazy with boredom. / Mr. Bleakman and Clifford save the day when a power failure threatens Birdwell Island.
episodes.title: Flood of Imagination / Lights Out

episodes.synopsis: Cleo and T-Bone realize they don't need Clifford's size to help their friends. / Kittens Betty and Billy insist on playing in Mr. Bleakman's yard.
episodes.title: A Big Help / The Trouble with Kittens

episodes.synopsis: A visiting dog influences Clifford to do things that he knows aren't right. / Ms. Carrington is getting married and her new name is "Mrs. Grumbly."
episodes.title: Led Astray / Wedding Bell Blues

episodes.synopsis: Equipment is disappearing from the local playground and it's up to K.C. to figure out what happened. / Jetta thinks camping is going to be boring.
episodes.title: Doggie Detectives / Camping It Up

episodes.synopsis: When Clifford accidentally gives himself a tie-dye bath, he ends up looking like a T-shirt from the '60s. / Mary is able to overcome her stage fright.
episodes.title: Tie Dyed Clifford / Stage Struck

episodes.synopsis: Mac wants to join T-Bone's pop band, but has a hard time fitting in. / Famous dog champion Oscar Owen Bright Like the Sun comes to Birdwell.
episodes.title: Doghouse Rock / Guess Who's Coming to Birdwell Island

episodes.synopsis: Cleo discovers her grandmother was a Queen, and that makes her a Princess! /  Skyscraper Jackson comes to Birdwell Island for a big basketball game.
episodes.title: Princess Cleo / Basketball Stories
